title: HadinEEon Electric Kettle 1.7L Glass Electric Tea Kettle (BPA Free) Cordless with LED Indicator Lights, Water Boiler with Boil-Dry Protection, Stainless Steel Inner Lid & Bottom
features:

【Food Grade Material】 The electric kettle is made with glass while the inner lid and base are made of food-grade 304 stainless steel. All the water contact surfaces are constructed of FDA approved & food grade material and heat-resistant.

【Heat up quickly and quietly】 It will be a big help in quickly boiling or heating water for cooking such as pasta or polenta. 【Shuts off automatically with boil-dry Protection】The cordless glass electric kettle provides peace of mind through thoughtful details like an auto shut-off safety feature to provide thermal shock protection. 360-Degree swivel base lets you remove the Illuminating cordless kettle for easy pouring and then it can be replaced at any angle.

【High-quality, scratch-resistant borosilicate glass design】Beautifully crafted from heat resistant glass with the blue light around the rim, it’s both stylish and functional. It provides a visual delight while boiling water as it heats up. Featuring aesthetics as well as durability and ease of use, it’s the perfect addition to your kitchen. Furthermore, it gives you a good view to see inside so that you can clean it thoroughly.

【HadinEEon excellent customer service】 HadinEEon continues to inspire everyone from professional cooks to the at-home chef with innovative technology from a TRUSTED brand. What's more, you get a 3 year and 1 year Money Back for your investment. Please feel free to Contact us if you have any request, we will solve your problem within 24 hours!

productDescription: A morning never gets perfect until you get the perfect kick of a good tea or coffee. HadinEEon kettle is a great option in fast boiling water.
With its 1200 powerful heating system, it works quickly and boils water within few minutes. It enables you to make hot cereals very quickly as well as French press, etc.

Safe and precise water boiler Equipped with British Strix thermostat control. Strix is the world leader in kettle controls, providing safer and stabler performance. Using genuine Strix controls guarantees safety and eliminates the risks associated with using low-quality components.
It is safe with the stainless steel on the lid where the steam reaches. Other water boilers that just have plastic will eventually crumble.
What’s more, it has glass sides which gives you a good view to see what happens in it. The wide opening makes it easy to put the brush in and clean it thoroughly.
Non-slip handle provides a secure grip and remains cool to touch.
It is comfortable to hold, and the spout doesn’t dribble when pouring. Easily serve and share favorite beverages with convenient cordless pouring.
Its made with glass & stainless steel. All the water contact surfaces are constructed of FDA approved & food grade material and heat-resistant.
What’s more, The cordless design allow you to lift up the kettle from the power base and take it anywhere you want.

reviews.reviewText:
I have not had the kettle for very long, but after a couple uses so far I am very pleased with this item. It seems well constructed and I expect it to last. It comes with a 3 year manufacturer's warranty, so it is nice having that little bit of extra peace of mind.

The kettle is made of glass with a plastic handle, similar to the materials of a regular coffee pot but heavier. The base is plastic and has a convenient area under it for storing the power cord for easy portability. The power switch is conveniently located on the handle and the pot lights up an attractive blue when powered on reminiscent of the blue flame of a gas stove.

I purchased this so I could have hot water in my home office away from the kitchen. Also it's nice to have the added security of not worrying about leaving a boiling kettle on the stove unattended. 1 liter (4 cups) of water took approximately 5 minutes to get to a full boil. Once it reaches boiling, the kettle shuts off automatically. The instructions that come with the kettle for care and operation are detailed. Like other coffee pots you need to maintain it to prevent limescale and such with vinegar or CLR. Mine is still too new so haven't really gotten to this point yet.

I'm pleased with this item and would reccomend it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great Value on Attractive Electric Kettle
reviews.reviewText: I am extremely satisfied with the Hadineeon Electric Kettle. It is attractive, easy to clean and heats quickly. It holds up to 1.7 liters of water. Plastic is only used on the exterior of the kettle. The water is in contact with glass and stainless steel, so there is no unwanted tastes. The blue LED's are a great addition, as they light up when heating and give the appearance of being on a gas burner. This kettle is a great value, and I would definitely buy again!
Made well and works great. Boiled water in about 5 minutes. Quality of Materials seems really good! Height is about 9” tall. Beautiful Blue LED lights up bottom and turns off when ready.

The stainless steel design is elegant and sophisticated. Love the transparent design which allows me to see how much water is inside and see when it boils. It also gives reassurance on cleaniness of the kettle. Very big open at top, which makes it super easy to fill in water and to clean. The speed to boil water is super fast and much faster than the current hard plastic kettle that I use. Also love the blue light when water is boiling, looks so cool. Premium quality product with durable material and a beautiful design! I love it!

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice product and seems to work well first day ... Warranties are a nice back up
reviews.reviewText: This is model 1733 and I now see another similar HadinEEon kettle, model 1705 for $28.90. I'm not sure what the difference is in features except there is a spout filter on the less expensive model. I purchased this as a replacement for a less expensive electric kettle which was great and lasted at least 3 years and then quit working. I then purchased a new kettle on Amazon from Algostar Adam for $20.99. It was okay but rocked on the base and after about five heatings, the element burned out and it quit working so back it went. This kettle is more expensive, at $35.90. At first I was comparing it to my first kettle and I didn't like the way the top opened on this one as the previous one opened from the handle. However, I realized that you don't have to open the top of this one to pour from it. All in all, it looks nice, seems to work well on this first day, and I'm hoping it will last a long time. The 3 year replacement warranty and one year refund offered by the Co. makes it worth trying and, from the reviews, it sounds like the Co. will honor the warranties. if needed.

I got this product to so I could make myself a nice cup of tea in the morning. And let me tell you I’m obsessed with it. It’s very satisfying to see the LED light come on at the bottom rim when boiling, it makes my morning a lot brighter. Not only this but the material it’s made of is so beautiful and very light to carry wherever you go! Which is very convenient when traveling. Aside from being stylish this kettle is very easy to clean compared to others. It’s wide opening at the top allows you to clean fast and efficient with no struggle whatsoever. I would recommend this product to anyone who wants an easy to use kettle that can also be useful when traveling. Bonus if you love LED things like myself. It would make the perfect gift or new edition to your home! :)

This is so much more useful than a normal kettle. Unlike a normal kettle, it does not whistle loudly when the water is boiled, instead, it automatically stops the heat going to the water, preventing it from getting any hotter. The product works really well and I am so glad I bought it.

reviews.reviewTitle: FAST and SILENT! Perfect for Coffee or Tea!!
reviews.reviewText: The HadinEEon Electric Kettle is an easy and efficient way to quickly heat up water to a perfect temperature without tying up the microwave or stove. The Kettle quietly heats up the water in no time at all. It has a cool blue light at the bottom that lets you know when the heating is complete. This has taken the place of my microwave as the go-to way to heat up water. I fully recommend it.

We are fans of instant coffee and various types of tea. This kettle is exactly what we needed. Around 3.5 minutes we were able to have our water ready for use. We have been looking at these for awhile but did not want to give up the counter space. Surprisingly it has a small footprint and the base holds the pot very steady even when it is full.
The blue light ring lets you see when the water starts to bubble up which is pretty cool. pouring is no issue as the spout in the front directs the water well. I tested the auto shut off several times and it does kick off on its own. But what I like most about it is the overall look and feel. The construction feels solid and the power switch on the handle glides on and off firmly. Its not hard to turn it off or on at all, it just feels like a sturdy on/off rocker switch that’s going to last. The biggest reason we chose this one over the others was due to the 3-year warranty. However, after holding and using it I do not believe we will have to utilize the warranty. It just feels solid.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good quality electric kettle with a touch of style
reviews.reviewText:
I love this kettle. I prefer glass kettles because I like to see the purity of water inside of it. This kettle is very good with a good quality and sturdy cable, switch on/off button and the light adds a touch of style and unique design for your kitchen.
The water boils very fast. Overall, I am very satisfied and I would definitely recommend this kettle to friends and family,

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to use, safe, BPA free, & 3 year warranty!
reviews.reviewText: This is such a great kettle. It’s BPA free (and after using a plastic kettle for a while, this makes all the difference and the water tastes so much cleaner), cordless, has such a cool look to it because it lights up blue during use, is easy to clean (the user manual has straightforward cleaning instructions), and comes with a 3 year warranty. Highly recommend this kettle!
This product is so helpful in the kitchen! Boils water very fast and is so easy to use.

Recently I ordered the HadinEEon Electric Kettle and fell in love with it the moment I hit the heat button to heat up a jug of water. Firstly the florescent blue light comes on and creates a lovely background effect as the water heats. It holds a tremendous amount of water. This kettle is very quick and heats a considerable amount of water in a quick period of time. You can see when it needs descaling as it is glass rather than stainless steel. It is light to hold and easy to fill. I highly recommend this kettle as it has so many marvelous benefits.

I had an electric kettle by a different manufacturer prior to purchasing this one. What a difference this one has made. It's easy to use, water boils quickly and it's easy to clean. The base unit is sturdy and has cord storage. The kettle is easy to fill, easy to pick up and to clean. So glad I returned the prior kettle and purchased this one!

reviews.reviewTitle: Other companies should follow HadinEEon's example here
reviews.reviewText:
I rarely give 5 star reviews but so far this product deserves it. I've waited a long time for a design that prevents hot water from touching any plastic, is glass and easy to clean. For a very reasonable price you get a great warranty and what looks like responsive, sincere customer service. This company apparently really listened to what buyers want - the kind that will earn my loyalty if they maintain these standards.
An aside: citric acid powder works great for any mineral deposits - 1/4 tsp, a pint of water, bring to a boil, cool, rinse, wipe dry. No lingering odor or taste.

I really like this product! I have another model of this kettle (from the same company) and have used it at home for about a year and I got this new model for my office! I never have problem with that kettle.
The design of this new kettle is sophisticated, beautiful, and practical. It is not heavy or too light. The size of the kettle is enough for everyday usage. It boils water quickly. The cleaning is basically piece of cake, no sediment!
Overall, great experience with the old one and the new one :)

reviews.reviewTitle: Well made, solid kettle at a great price!
reviews.reviewText: This is a really solid kettle. Well made, feels real solid when I hold it. Glass, stainless. Looks great in the kitchen! To boil 1.7L, it took about 3-4 minutes which I felt was pretty quick. My old kettle took twice as long! Good buy, highly recommend. L

I am in the process of getting rid of products
that can hurt your health. Since borosilicate glass resists chemicals and acid degradation, you don't need to worry about stuff seeping into your water so I made the decision to choose this kettle. Also, it looks beautiful on my kitchen counter top and matches my smart home style with the Blue LED indicator.

reviews.reviewTitle: Attractive design, large capacity, won't scald user when pouring, water stays hot a long time
reviews.reviewText:
I have used a kettle like this one everyday for years to make tea at work.

Here's what I like about this one.

The look: the sleek design and fun blue light when heating look cool on my counter, so I don't feel compelled to hide it away in the cabinet, which is good since I use it all day every day.

Auto shutoff: I recently purchased a coffeemaker without auto shutoff, and wow, what a pain.

The locking lid! With my old kettle, the steam or the processes of pouring would pop open the fill top and scald me. The one has a push button, slow-open top to guard against that.

The water get very hot (cold to rolling boil in about 7 minutes) and stays hot for a long time, I can still make tea with the heated water an hour later.

Finally, the capacity.

The only aspect that prevented me from giving this five stars is that the unit isn't as quiet as my last one.
I often use this at work, so the hiss of the water heating (about 7 minutes to a rolling boil) might disturb others. It is not loud, but not silent either. Although, with how long the water stays hot, I won't have to run it as much.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great electric kettle as well as great eye candy on kitchen counter ☘️
reviews.reviewText:
While I’ve had a stainless electric kettle with an LED light indicator showing temperature variations as it heated up I was not enthusiastic about the inability to determine the amount of water in the container and a smaller opening at the top. I became aware of this kettle and was attracted immediately to it because it was clear which allowed me to see how much water was inside. The blue lights were just an added attraction 🤣 and the bubbles as the water heated quickly made me laugh🙀 I also liked the wider “mouth” of the top because I could also easily heat soups too. There are easy to read markings on the glass carafe showing water (or soup) quantity. It is easy to turn on and off and quick heating and quite attractive on the kitchen counter. The only hiccup is the top opening mechanism. Once I got the hang of it I was fine. But you need to slide the recessed “catch” towards the handle and it opens. If you are right handed use your right hand to hold the handle and slide the “catch” back with the left hand and up pops the top. My first attempts had me holding the handle with the right hand and simultaneously pushing on the “catch” which didn’t open the top but did succeed in turning on the kettle again. Maybe an arrow pointing towards the handle on the sliding “catch “ might be a good addition. Or maybe a little clearer explanation in the otherwise excellent Instructions world help. This little issue was the only reason I didn’t give it 5 stars on Ease of Use. I miss not having the temperature readout only because some of the teas I use give specific optimum temperatures although I’m not at all sure that it really matters and isn’t just a marketing ploy as an excuse for the dollar amount that is charged for the tea 🤣🤣🤣
I’m really delighted with the new unit and give it a strong Buy recommendation after, at the manufacturers request, I tried it. My stainless kettle will be “gifted” to my sister 🙀🥴🤣🤣🤣

First, after just one week of use, this electric kettle had so much loose limescale in it. Every time I boiled water, it was laced with limescale particles. In addition, the kettle is noisy and takes a while to boil. After a few uses, it already looks dreary. My previous, glass electric kettle (which I replaced only because, after many years of use, it looked shabby), had scale build-up but only after many uses. Scale most likely due to the water in my town, but limescale should not build-up after one use.
I am VERY disappointed with this kettle and would not recommend purchasing it.
Lastly, when the kettle arrived, inside the box was a leaflet from the company that said, if I left a review giving the kettle 5 Stars, I would receive a free item from them. The leaflet listed items I could choose from, at no charge, FOR FREE!!!! Items included a toaster and electric can opener!! They would send me the item of my choice FOR FREE if I gave the kettle a 5 Star rating!!!! Disgusting!
Also, I want to add that the lid on the kettle does not close unless you push it tight. The "switch" to open the lid is located on the top of the lid, in the center, close to the spout.
EVERY time I use this item, I literally shout out, "I hate this kettle" every time I fill it.
Cannnot stress this too much, DO NOT BUY THIS KETTLE! It is a piece of junk! I rarely take the time to post reviews but this thing has me fumming!

Updated review 9/28/2019 - I had an issue with the kettle not working correctly and customer service was so fast and willing to help me fix my issue. The initial kettle leaked and they sent me a new one.
I love it so much, it heats up super fast, looks awesome on the countertops, it's 100% plastic-free on the inside, has a cute blue light, plus super easy to clean.
I recommend scaling it with citric acid, you can get it at Target or Walmart instead of vinegar.
Please don't hesitate in purchasing this Kettle, I purchased other 2 fancy ones that claimed to be plastic-free and were not, major burnt plastic smell.
THANK YOU!

Looks cheap and it leaked

This is the first electric tea kettle I have ever owned, and I am impressed. I have my own distiller. Distilled water is highly reactive because there is nothing in it. That is why it makes such good coffee, tea, etc. Because of that, glass is the very best thing in which to make tea. That was the reason I bought this unit. I make a lot of tea at a time, and it doesn't take but a few minutes for the water to boil. The unit shuts off once reaching a boiling point. I was amazed that the bottom where the glass unit sets into doesn't get hot. It is cool to the touch. The top is not hot, and the handle is not hot. Only the glass container gets hot so avoid touching that. The blue light that turns on when you are boiling your water is so cool and beautiful to watch while it is heating the water. I would recommend this to folks. It serves my purpose very well.

reviews.reviewTitle: Best glass kettle from HadinEEon for the price!
reviews.reviewText:
My stainless steel electric kettle of poor quality has just died and I was looking for a new one from Amazon. Too many to choose from but suddenly I noticed a pretty one in glass from HadinEEon, a seller I have always trusted since I have bought their great milk frother. Right away I purchased their Kettle for a very raisonnable price of $38.90 with a 10%coupon.
It did not take me long to see that this beautiful heat resistant glass kettle with a blue light around the rim was not only functional but stylist! It heats quickly and quietly with a boil-dry protection. I appreciate also its big opening at the top that makes very easy to fill in water and to clean. it is BPA free: no plastic comes into contact with the water at any time. I would like to add that HadinEEon has a rare excellent customer service: I have had a question about my milk frother in the past, I have contacted them and they answered me back very rapidly. If you are not satisfied with your kettle, you will get a 3 year and 1 year money back.
As you have guessed, I love my new appealing glass kettle. I highly recommend it. Buy it without hesitation!

reviews.reviewTitle: Better than Expected, Quality Product at a great price
reviews.reviewText: Very nice price point for this large 1.7 L kettle. Quick boil heats water fast, has a nice design. LED lights up blue when heating. Clear glass makes it easy to see to clean with a little vinegar mixed with water. Boil dry protection is a great safety feature. The cord can be kept at the exact size and any extra can be looped back under the base to be kept out of the way. The kettle itself is cordless which allows you to take it off the base when hearing is complete so you can make any hot drinks anywhere you desire. Three year manufacturers warranty and great customer service. This is my second Kettle by this maker and I am extremely pleased with the price, design and quality of this product. Will be purchasing more as Gifts.

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to use and auto shut off! Beautiful see through design.
reviews.reviewText: I love this kettle! I live in America and tea is not such a huge thing. So when I had the odd tea I used the microwave. I kept scalding myself by overheating the mug. I also just got my son a French press. Between those two things I figured a kettle would be the way to go. I used to own a fancier one many years ago but dint want to spend that much (the same one is now over 100$!) This one is brilliant especially for my teens. You can see what is going on and it auto shuts off. We’ve all already (as you can tell by the photo!) enjoyed macchiatos this morning. Skip the coffee maker guys. Get a French press and a grinder AND this kettle. I can’t wait for all the cocoa and tea we will easily be able to have this winter.

reviews.reviewTitle: Happy with my purchase and customer service
reviews.reviewText:
Wanted an electric kettle as I am a tea drinker and had to share my coffee maker...chose this based on other review and am extremely happy with it. Out of the box, washed, ran water thru as instructed, emptied and made a cup of tea. Love the feature that it shuts off when boiling. Top opens fully for cleaning and love that the base stays cool, does not harm my new countertops. It’s just what I was looking for.
Update...2 days after I received it, it stopped working. Filled it up, pressed button, nothing. Returned for refund..too bad as I really liked th design.
Update #2... after contacting the company about my issues with the kettle, the sent me another one (at no charge). I received it and have been using it since without any problems..
Their customer service went beyond what I would have expected and am very happy with their product and company. Would definitely recommend this kettle

I have used electric water kettles in the past that leave a lot to be desired. The HadinEEon Electric Kettle is a wonderful water kettle. It heats fast and is quiet. Very well constructed you know you have a quality product. So many times today you purchase something that works for only a short time then quits. With the HadinEEon Electric Kettle you have peace mind. It comes with a 3 year warranty. I do pour over coffee and thought I would have to purchase an additional kettle with a long spout to make my coffee. The way the HadinEEon Electric Kettle is constructed that is not the case. It works perfectly for that as well. I would highly recommend this kettle.

I love this kettle. It is easy to use, easy to clean up, and very practical. It performs just as promised. Boiling hot water in 5 minutes. I found it turns on with my plug timer right before I get up in the morning, so my water is hot and ready to use to brew my French Press coffee. I have used a variety of electric kettles, if this continues to work over time, it will be my favorite so far. The blue light ring that is on while brewing is unique and actually practical. I would purchase this product again, if necessary. Great two year warranty as well.

I like to have an extra electric kettle for my upstairs coffee bar. This one heats up a bit faster than the one I have owned longer. I have to admit, I like the lighting on the bottom that lets me know when the water is finished heating. It is so quiet also that I sometimes forget I am heating water.
It is nice looking and not as cumbersome as my other tea kettle.
I like the price of this as well. It is a great value for the money. It has a warranty which I like to have.
I am happy with it and will buy another for my cabin.

reviews.reviewTitle: Stylish kettle that boils water quickly.
reviews.reviewText: I received this kettle about a week ago. It was quite a challenge to choose a kettle as there are so many to choose from. I choose this one in the end as it seemed to have the most positive reviews and I liked how it looks. It is very cool looking, especially with the blue light that let’s you know it’s on. It boils water very quickly - about 5 minutes when filled to the max level, and quicker with less water. The auto shutoff feature works well, just a few seconds after it begins to fully boil (see video). My only criticism is the location of the on/off switch at the top of the handle as it very easy to inadvertently turn it to the on position. However, this did not retract from 5 stars as my wife and I quickly became used to it, but something for the manufacturer to think about. I also like that the lid has a slider to open and to lock it into place. Finally, the whole carafe fits under our refrigerator water dispenser, which makes it super easy to fill and should also help reduce calcium build-up. All in all, this is a very stylish kettle that is quiet and boils water fast.

reviews.reviewTitle: It’s a great way to minimize microwave usage
reviews.reviewText: This electric kettle (Model DE1733) holds water for up to a 7 cup capacity. It’s very easy to use. All you have to do is fill up the kettle by pressing the button on top which opens/closes the lid. Then plug the cord into an outlet and press the switch on/off button which brings the water to a boil and also activates an LED light. The electric kettle becomes cord-free when it’s removed from the swivel base which makes it easy and safe to clean. This electric kettle works well for quick beverage and meal prepping such as tea, oatmeal, and instant noodle soup cups that require hot water. It’s a great way to minimize microwave usage.

reviews.reviewTitle: Improvement over my previous electric kettle for a few reasons....
reviews.reviewText: My previous electric glass water kettle was very good and lasted for years, totaling 2-3,000 cycles of bringing cold water to a boil. This kettle improves upon my previous (different brand) in a ways: First, water does not have to come into contact with ANY plastic if you pour carefully. The glass appears to be higher quality, and opening for pouring in water is much wider when fully open. I can't comment on the reliability of this kettle as I have only had it a week, but the design is everything I need.

I bought an apartment and noticed that i cant make a cup of tea and enjoy good view in my window. I said to myself that i need a kettle. Scrolling Amazon happened a miracle, I saw it. That was Hadineeon. I shouted: Oh boy, this is Jack Pot . And I pressed "buy now" and on the next day I received it. After unpacking I was surprised. The design was awesome. Crystal-clear glass in combination with a metallic lid and comfortable plastic handle makes beautiful usual effect classic and stylish. My first cup of tea was made in a minute, because this boy boiled water in a blink of on eye. I had rejoiced with silent working and blinking of blue lights. This little kettle became my good assistant and made my life in the new apartment more comfortable. Now I enjoy good view in my window with a hot cup of tea.

I recently decided to purchase an electric kettle and the design of this kettle is just awesome and of high quality. Its made with glass and most of all it is BPA free. There is no contact of plastic to the water and it is very safe to use. The water boils quickly a full pot of tap water in about 7 miuntes ! It holds upto 1.7L and has the auto shut off feature too. So you do not have to worry about leaving kettle on. It is a nice product! I've purchased so called stainless steel electric kettles in the past that started to show signs of rust in as litte as 1 week of use. Don think that will be a problem with this on because it made of glass.

This is a good product. It’s nice looking kettle which does its job pretty fast! I normally use about 2-4 cups on a regular basis and in no time super hot water is available from this kettle. Rarely I use about 6-7 cups and I am pretty amazed at the speed it takes to boil that much of water.

I like the blue lights that glow when the kettle is on and it turns off with the auto shut off feature once the water is hot. The cable is long enough to set it on the counter and when not required, I like the winding feature as it shows less clutter. Spout is neat, pours just fine and the wide opening is good for cleaning. Looks elegant but is sturdy. All in all a pretty good product I would recommend.

reviews.reviewTitle: I am loving my new HadenEEon Kettle. It is beautiful in appearance and Efficient In It's Function!
reviews.reviewText: I love the price and the quality! It's like the Rolls Royce of Kettles! It's beautiful in appearance and heats up water very efficiently! To top it off, I don't have to be concerned with ingesting chemicals leached from plastic. I am so happy with it!!

Hinge inside the kettle is plastic. Boiling water will condensate on the plastic hinge and drip back into the water.
Inaccurate website description and I am speechless as to all the reviews here that claim there's no plastic. smh.

I, primarily, use this to only boil water. I would suggest that other use in the same manner. It works well and gets water boiling within a min or two by switching on the button to on or powered position. It has lovely lights on it that indicate the kettle is on or powered up. It has an automatic shut off so you can set and forget it. So far I've used it for tea, cup ramen, and instant coffee. The water stays heated for quite awhile after it shuts off. The lid doesn't seem to be detachable which make it seem a little harder to wash. Hence only using it to boil water, so you wont have to wash it as frequently. I gave it 5 stars because of it sleek look and ease of use. I've only had it for a short while but have enjoyed it very much.

I have not noticed any off taste with this tea kettle. I had ordered another one from Amazon earlier this year.....not the same brand....but it died on me after a bout 10 months and the warranty had run out. So a couple of things drew me to this one: I read all the positive reviews: the lid is not made or plastic so the water does not come in contact with plastic; it has a 3 year warranty. Since getting it this past week I have really enjoyed it. It is a good size and the base is not as large as the last one I bought. It is very attractive. Also I can clean the inside whereas the other one I could not put my hand into. The one thing that might be considered a negative is that it takes a little longer to heat the water than my last one. But this is minor so I would definitely recommend this kettle from the few days that I have been using it.

Super easy to use. Sets up in seconds. You will have hot boiling water in under 2 mins! Very easy to clean. It is made out of very strong glass so it’s built to last. I’m so happy I bought this because it helps with entertaining large groups of people when making tea. I also use it to warm up the kids thermos before putting hot lunches in them. I would definitely recommend!

Nice design, quick boiling with auto shut-off, quality kettle just looking at the electrical cord 3x16GAW good solid wire to plug in the electrical outlet. Electrical cord wraps around bottom of base for length adjustment. Glass kettle has measurements in cups and liters. Easy accessible switch on top. One year replacement and three years warranty is impressive. I don't see anything negative about it

reviews.reviewTitle: Week One: Works great, Looks great
reviews.reviewText: I've had this electric kettle for almost a week. I've used it every day, and so far I'm very pleased with how it works and how it looks. There was no strange plasticky smell when unboxed, which is always a good sign. The glass is clear and strong, and the whole unit feels sturdy and well-made. The design has a sleek modern look that probably works well with just about any kitchen decor. The cord is nice and long, so I can pull the unit far enough away from the backsplash so that it isn't directly underneath the upper cabinets when in use. I gave it 4 stars for cleaning only because I've yet to do anything beyond the initial before-use clean (which was super fast and easy). At this time, I would definitely recommend this product to a friend.

reviews.reviewTitle: Looks really nice and easy to use and clean
reviews.reviewText: We are a team loving family. I have been meaning to buy an electric kettle for use at home and convenience. It is great quality and easy to use. The Glass kettle gives it a classy look so I might move it from my kitchen to the countertop facing the living room (nice for guests to see hehe). Be sure to read the cleaning instructions with vineger and water. I am particular about cleaning my kitchen gadgets and this one was easy.

reviews.reviewTitle: This is the best kettle I’ve ever had!
reviews.reviewText:
I love this HadinEEon kettle! It boils water extremely fast, is super easy to clean and the capacity is one of the largest I’ve seen.

And one important factor is that, although it has a max water level mark, it has nowhere inside where water would leak into the handle or interior workings...preventing water from damaging the electronics. This is a very good kettle!

After buying a milk frother from this company, I learned that they also make an electric kettle. I purchased this one and after using if for several weeks, I'm pretty pleased with it. It works well and quickly, is quiet, and looks very nice. To me, reliability is the most important thing. We'll see how long it lasts, but from all indications, it looks well built and I expect several years of service. I do drink a lot of tea!

I was in the market for a new electric kettle that was of good quality and looked attractive in our kitchen. This product hits the marks in both of those categories. I like the size of this kettle since with one boil you can serve many cups of tea/coffee. It's very nicely made, parts used look like they will last for a long time. I like the fact that you can hide the cord underneath the stand when you are not using the kettle. I love the see-through design, very helpful to clearly see how much water is remaining or how much needs to be added. The neon blue color that lights up when the kettle is on is very nice tough to an already attractive and modern design. Boil time is pretty quick as well. I am really enjoying using this electric kettle, great purchase!

reviews.reviewTitle: Better than that old style kettle
reviews.reviewText: I love this kettle. It looks modern because frankly, it is modern. It's convenient to use. It's effective in its usage. I really enjoy the fact I can just put it in its own spot on the counter. I don't need to take up a burner on the stove. I don't need to warm water up in other less effective ways like using a Keurig or microwave. It takes about 60 seconds to boil water. It shuts itself off after reaching the boiling point. Since it's clear I can also just watch it and see when it's ready. I don't need to wait for any high pitched squealing that the dogs of the neighborhood can hear. There's no learning whatsoever. I took it out of the box and plugged it in. It's incredibly easy to use and boils water extremely fast. I'm throwing out my old metal kettle. This kettle is by far and away the best kettle I've ever used.

I love this kettle! First, it heats very fast. Second, I love being able to see how much water to add ... with my old metal kettle, I guesstimated by weight, which was not onerous, but I do enjoy the visibility with the HaddinEEon. This kettle is very attractive on the counter, also. i hope to have a long and enjoyable relationship with my new kettle!

It does what it is supposed to do, while looking rather nice. It boiled 1.5L of water in about 7 minutes. That is not the fastest electric kettles I have seen, but definitely no slow. We dont have room in our kitchen, so it has to stay on the counter and that is where this thing shines - it looks nice and clean. The blue light that shows when it is on is a nice touch and it shuts off by itself after it has finishing boiling the water. Overall a good product.

reviews.reviewTitle: Improper sealing of lid which causes steam to hit pouring hand
reviews.reviewText: The issue with this item is that the back portion of the lid is poorly sealed. Because of this, steam flows onto your hand when you pour your hot water. This is potentially dangerous and should be remedied. I am not returning it because it is too much trouble and I will just hold the handle very far down. I may seal the lid shut with silicone and add water via the spout - I am afraid someone else who is not expecting this will get steam exposure. Definitely not recommended unless this design flaw or quality control issue is fixed.

Very easy to operate with one on/off switch. Comfortable handle/grip. Cleaning is easy, just empty and air dry or wipe with dry cloth. Very pretty with blue base light when heating up to boil, then unit automatically turns off. Approximately eight minutes to boil max capacity 7 cups (1.7L); approximately three minutes for minimum capacity 2 cups (0.5L.) Plan to use at my office so large capacity will be appreciated, as well as auto-off function. Would recommend.

reviews.reviewTitle: Fast,Comes in hand and luxury look & Quality. EXCELLENT!
reviews.reviewText:
This product really comes in handy for morning tea or middle of the night cozy tea.
I layed back down thinking it'll take the usual time it takes on the stove to get the water boiling but,... as soon as I layed down, in like the next three min. The water was already boiling with the water filled pretty high.About 6cups.❤Its like I sat down just to get back up! As a tea lover i love my electric kettle and i would recommend it to you.. Also it's great because if you make coffee and want to save it for later, and stock it in the fridge, you can take it out the next morning, add some ice and there you have ice coffee my friends. It holds your leftovers like a pitcher of juice as well. It comes in handy for multiple things.

I purchased this product to use mostly for tea and instant coffee. When I opened the package I was immediately struck by the sleek design. I cleaned the kettle like instructed and filled it about halfway with water. I set it on the base, plugged it in, flipped the switch on and was so impressed by the blue led lights, absolutely love this part of the design! The water began to boil so quickly it was amazing. After the water starts to boil the switch flips off by itself. Great for busy people, like myself, who may forget to turn it off. I would definitely recommend this product to friends and family.

Nice electric kettle. Packaged well. Overall pleased with this product. Only used a few days but seems to work well. I will update if the quality changes as I use it.

Pros:
Cord stores in base
Glass kettle- love that no plastic touches the water
Locking lid
Quick boil- for me the max (7 cups) took 7.5 mins to reach boiling and 4 cups took 5 minutes to reach boiling.

Cons:
Auto shut off after it reaches boiling, turns off entirely, doesn’t maintain boiling temperature. However, I left it about 7-10 mins after it turned off and when I came back and restarted it, it reached boiling in about one minute, so it apparently retained heat well.

This electric kettle was easy to use, very quiet, and powerful! I will be using this more than I use my Keurig or microwave. I went to make my fiancé and myself a cup of tea and decided to give the kettle a try. I normally use the Keurig and she normally uses the microwave. We both enjoyed the brewing of this electric kettle and were wondering why we didn’t order it sooner. The tea got hot and stayed hot longer than most other brewing machines. We also felt like with the hotness we were able to taste the flavor more. I would recommend this to everybody looking for an easy and quick option. Very powerfully, so you’re not sacrificing your brew by going electric!

This kettle was purchased to replace an older kettle that was on its last legs. The HadinEEon Electric Kettle 1.7L Glass Electric Tea Kettle has a clean simple design that allows it to fit in in any kitchen. It has a large opening making it very easy to fill (an improvement over our last kettle). It also boils rapidly, which is important when you come in from the cold and need a mug of tea quickly (yes, tea - I'm British!). Having the auto-off feature is great (it had died on our old kettle), and the blue LED light is a fun feature that also lets you know it is has been turned on to boil. Looking forward to many years of use.

I like this high-powered kettle, usually I need 3 cups of boiling water only at a time. After turn on the power, I do something else , wait for 3-4 minutes, than I got the water that had just been boiled. It is better than the water that has been heated repeatedly by previously water heater . And watching the water dancing in a glass kettle lit with blue light is also a pleasure.
It heats up in just over a minute with about 4 cups of water. The light isn't too bright but definitely noticeable as well. Great size and a nice clean look!

No more boiling water on the stove! This is great for when you need to only boil water. It heats up very nicely and shuts off when water is boiling. It does takes about 10 minutes to boil when filled all the way up. I will be using this all the time. Great for coffee, tea and hot chocolate.

I have been using it for about 2 weeks now to replace a different kettle that no longer had a working auto shut off. So far I am liking it and it has been working well. It fits into our stainless steal kitchen very well and seems well made. The backing was also very good so no worries of damage on shipping. My only minor gripe is that there is no cover release on the handle so to open the cover you have to release the lever on the cover itself which after boiling water can be hot. But the description did not say that it had a handle release I just made an assumption so that was on me and its really not a huge deal.

reviews.reviewTitle: Wish I had purchased this kettle sooner!
reviews.reviewText: For years I've heated water for my tea in the microwave. Recenty, my husband has acquired a taste for it, too, so it made sense to use a tea kettle. The HadinEEon kettle not only performs great, it's pretty to look at, and I don't mind leaving it out on the counter. It's also come in handy for things other than boiling water for tea.

This is a really good quality and high-end product. It is also an FDA approved based on booklet it comes with.
My father used it to warm up water in the winter months due to sensitized teeth to cold liquid.
I have also used it to warmed up the water to make tea. While warming up the water, I added some fresh mint leaves. It really gives that flavored kicked.
Uses it110V but warms up the water super faster. I mean within 1/10 fraction of time of conventional method.

reviews.reviewTitle: Solid, Well Made Kettle with Nice Style and Finish
reviews.reviewText: Well made and solidly constructed. Switch on handle firm and seems made to last. The 1200 watts is more than sufficient for a fast boil, and if you have other load on your kitchen circuits less chance of tripping breaker. Highly recommended.

I needed something to heat water, and this fits the bill! We don't have a stove at work and I got tired of heating up mugs in the microwave. This is quick, clean, and easy to use. The LED light is nice too, no questing whether the device is on or off.

This is my third electric tea kettle. I love the look, easy to use features and how quickly it heats my water. It looks great on my counter. My kids love the blue light. We are avid tea and hot cocoa drinkers so my kettle is used a couple times a day. Great buy for the price.

reviews.reviewTitle: It has no plastic components tainting water taste.
reviews.reviewText: I love the quick heating as well as the beautiful design. I will be enjoying tea more often rather than using a stovetop kettle. This HadinEEon is perfect and shows how much water is left for another cup vs. traditional stove kettle. I plan to bring it with me to holiday parties for making tea and hot chocolate 1

I've been looking around for a good electric kettle and I was referred by my roomate about this product from HadinEEon. it came with good packaging and everything look very stylish. The good part about it is that the lid is also made from quality stainless steel so it's safe for boiling water! I wouldn't buy if the lid is plastic. Everything was pretty solid and well made. It took 8 minutes and 14 seconds to boil a 1.7 L water. Very convenient and efficient way to boil water. It's backed-up by HadinEEon for 3 years, so I have nothing to worry about! Highly recommended!

I just got this kettle 2 days ago and so far it's great. The boil time for water when full is about 7 minutes which is on the slow side but everything else is great thus far. I like the blue like and the ease to clean. I would recommend this kettle

super easy to use and fast! the only problem is that the button to release the lid is on the lid and becomes hot sometimes otherwise i love it and it’s very amusing for my kids to watch as they are eating breakfast!

I really enjoyed this it’s quick to boil and no fuss having to turn on a stove top teapot and walking away and running back to turn it off. It shuts off soon as it’s done so that’s a really good feature!
Really nice kettle, boils quick, easy to use and clean. Never used an electric kettle before but now that I have I love it. Highly recommend this product.

The base doesn't take much space, will be using this a lot during the winter for some hot cocoa. Takes about 1-2 minutes to heat up a good amount of water. Just put it on the base and turn on the switch, simple as that.

Easy to use, beautiful, and love the blue light. Only thing to watch out for is that if you accidentally turn the switch 'on' while cleaning or using, and put it back on the base, the switch is still 'on'. I was too distracted to notice the blue light was clearly on as I was rushing for work and rushed out of the kitchen. Kettle continued to steam with the lid open until there was almost no water left. Operator error, learning curve, duh. No damage done. Would buy again.

Wow I love this glass kettle! Not only do I make my afternoon teas with it I also use it for my oatmeal in the morning! So easy and fast to use also you don’t need to store it away because it’s so stylish and modern. However you do have to regularly wash out thoroughly with vinegar because of calcium build up at the bottom.

Love this kettle. I use it to boil water for my cafe filtre. The brand I used before leaked - this one does not. And it's true that no plastic comes in contact with the water, and the inside of the lid is metal. I like that, while the bottom is metal, the sides are glass. And of course it's so much faster than a cookto-p

just an awesome product, heats water quickly and cleans easily.
glass adds the value that your water is not absorbing any forign particles.

thank you Hadineeon.

The water boils in just 2-3 minutes. it is really amazing to see this happening in very few minutes. I love the blue light inside the kettle. The water remains hot for long time. The best thing is that after the water is boiled, you can detach the kettle from its charging base and the bottom of the kettle is cool enough to touch or place on a wood surface. It is a large kettle and works just as advertised.

reviews.reviewTitle: Cool kettle that doesn't break a budget
reviews.reviewText: Very cool looking kettle with pretty light, when turned on. Love clear glass. Boils faster than stove top. Using it to boil water for everything, not only tea, like eggs, macaroni, etc...
We love this teapot. We haven't used it for coffee since we're tea drinkers, but it heats the water so fast and we just love the blue light :) you won't be disappointed.
Love this kettle so far, I like that it has an LED light when boiling and goes nicely in my kitchen with all my other modern chrome/black appliances. Also boils water well more importantly lol

Just received, packaged well, seems to be made of high quality material and a simple design. I like that no plastic seems to come in contact with the water. According to the company unlike the older less expensive GK1705 model, this DE1733 has a British Strix thermostat control for safer and more stable performance. Customer service was responsive to answer my questions. Looking forward to testing it out will update review with any developments.

reviews.reviewTitle: Does not get any better than this
reviews.reviewText: Like drinking from pure clean glass. No plastic comes in contact with the liquid. Automatic shut off makes this a no brainer. Does not get any better than this.

reviews.reviewTitle: Very nice kettle and very nice price
reviews.reviewText: I was a little skeptical because the kettle I use at work is all stainless steel but this glass kettle/stainless steel is amazing. So beautiful with the LED light and it boils very fast. It is also extremely quiet. I'm hooked. I normally put my cookware and small appliances away when not in use, but this one has a permanent spot on top of the counter.
Bought this kettle to replace a Farberware kettle with a plastic lid that wouldn’t lose its plastic smell. This kettle made great tea from first cup and it’s made very well and attractive. I’m happy!
I most like that the kettle is glass and does not affect the taste or release chemicals into the water I’m boiling. The kettle seems to be of high quality. Looks very nice as well.

reviews.reviewTitle: Fast to boil with a modern look
reviews.reviewText: This kettle works as expected and boils water very quickly. The added LED light is also a great feature especially when using this as night. The glass is a nice touch and ensures there is no BPA in the product. Id highly recommend!
Loving this kettle. The light up feature is handy to know when it’s in use, and the auto-off feature and quick boil is a life-saver when making coffee! Now I don’t have to tend the stove!

I bought my first electric kettle and I’m really impressed how quickly it boils the water. The moment you plug in blue light turns on to indicate it’s working and clear glass helps you see when water starts boiling. Light and power shuts off automatically once it’s ready. Best for the price and I love it!

reviews.reviewTitle: well made, quality product with a three year warranty to back it up.
reviews.reviewText: Product came well packaged, after cleaning as suggested, found it could boil water faster that using a kettle on a gas range. Very well made and the three year warranty confirms the quality. Very easy to clean and the blues led lights while heating are a very nice touch.

We've been using this kettle for several days - at least four times per day - and so far, we really like it. It boils water quickly, and I like that the top lid is stainless steel. It seems like a good value for the price.

Comes to a full boil with 7 cups of water in 8 minutes. Base lights up blue when heating. I might not even heat until full boil...starts bubbling within a couple minutes. Base doesn't get hot, just alittle warm so you can just remove it off the heating pad straight to the table. Simple, sturdy, great buy.

Having just been diagnosed with breast cancer, I threw away my plastic electric tea kettle and ordered this one. I’m not sure if this is why I have cancer, but I’m not taking any chances. I like the fact that this one has minimal plastic and the boiling water doesn’t touch it. I’m looking forward to many years with this one.

I have not had the kettle for very long. I am very pleased with the overall product and would recommend this to anyone. I have also purchased for my daughter for her baby formula. It comes with a 3-year manufacturer's warranty, so it is nice having that little bit of extra peace of mind. I purchased this for boiling water for my french press. Maintenance is low as long as you keep it clean.

reviews.reviewTitle: Top pick for hot water users !!!
reviews.reviewText: I was so excited to get this product because I love to drink tea. This product is amazing. The actual kettle was attractive. Ok amazing this water boiled in less than 3 minutes. Super cool it turned electric blue to let you know that it was hot and ready. The cord wrapped around the base for easy storage. It was just easy to use and I was so happy it turned itself off. I will be buying one for my mother now.
Automatic shut-off a much needed feature in our home. We do the pour-over method of making coffee and tea. Perfect addition to our kitchen!

reviews.reviewTitle: Way better than my last one!
reviews.reviewText: This is so easy to use! I love how they made it so simple but so durable. Definitely better than the last one I had. Highly recommended!!!

I bought this kettle because I could not taste it at all in the water it heated. It appears to me that most kettles have the same basic feature set - quick heating, auto-off on boil, dry carafe protection - all of which are important, but good tasting hot water is essential. Without good taste, none of the other qualities is enough. I am very happy with this kettle and especially its 3 year warranty.
Great, modern looking kettle! It’s a great size and fits perfectly in my minimal apartment! Great product!!

This kettle has a very nice, clean design! Definitely one of the nicer ones I have seen. You can tell the glass is high quality. Had it for two weeks now and it works greatl (heats quickly, not wobbly). My only -minor- complaint would be the lid not staying open while you pour. If it isn't held, it hits onto the glass. I fear it could crack it, although this kind of glass is made to be durable. Love it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Inside, where the glass meets the hotplate there is rubber or plastic. NOT toxic free.
reviews.reviewText: I returned this product. Inside, there is some type of rubber or plastic material between the hot plate and where the glass meet. for those of you looking for toxic free this is not it. We used a pin to test it; the pin moved freely on the glass but when it got to the hot plate it got stuck, there is some type of plastic or rubber.

Super happy with this buy!!! I ordered this kettle to make my morning tea and I absolutely love it. It warms up fast and is super easy to use. It looks so fancy and looks great in my kitchen. I will be purchasing one in the future for my mom.
It's light weighted and has blue light ring in the bottom when in use. Happy with the purchase so far :)

reviews.reviewTitle: A Nice sized Kettle for a GREAT price
reviews.reviewText: I bought this kettle and have used it a few times. The important thing to do is to make sure that you rise it before you use it the first time. The water heated up very quickly. The blue light is also very cool!

Boils water faster than a normal kitchen kettle. Auto-shut off works great and the blue light is useful in telling whether or not the water is done boiling. The product may sound like it's plastic when tapping on it, but it is definitely glass. Product comes with a booklet that also instructs how to clean (we have the product for about 2 weeks but have not cleaned it yet).
Filled half full, turned it on and ended up with 90% of the water on the counter and floor.

I ordered this product to use to make tea and instant coffee. I also wanted a product that was BPA free and that replaced my old Keurig machine. The kettle is compact, runs well and produces really nice HOT water that tastes fresh and clean. I would recommend the kettle. The only problem is the thick cord. I had to play with the cord to get it to lay right so the base would lay flat.

Best electric kettle I have owned. It is made with glass and stainless steel and BPA-free. The glass sides can give you a good view to see the inside. The design of the wide-open lid mouth makes it easy to thoroughly clean the bottle. The capacity is big —1.7 L, taking about 8 min to boil which is pretty fast. And the kettle has a pretty appearance!
Christmas shopping early and this will make a great gift! I haven’t used it, but it seems like a great quality item. Pretty and a good weight. Perfect for cold weather drinks like hot chocolate.
Got this for my daughter as she wanted to have something to hear up water for tea and not disturb the Keurig. She loves it! Heats up nicely.

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to use, light weight to carry on
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use and value for 30$ I soo happy with this kettle , I tried to many kettle this is the best one , I recommend
When they say quick heat they arent kidding! Super fast heat up and a very simple set up. It has a blue light to show you when it's on

reviews.reviewTitle: simple, easy to clean, & quality material
reviews.reviewText:
I purchased 3 different electric kettle before this one. I am finally satisfied with this one! The lid opens widely and I can put my hand in to scrub easily. This does not have any fancy functions like warming, setting different temperatures, etc., which I would have not used anyway. I always prefer basics over too many useless buttons.
It looks simple, elegant, and clean!

This is by far the best electric tea kettle, I just love the sleek look and the glass pitcher! it does not whistle loudly when the water is boiled, instead, it automatically stops the heat going to the water, preventing it from getting any hotter.
I love how fast it boils water and I can have my coffee or tea so easily! The blue light is also neat! I give it 5 stars!

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy and Auto shuts off gives me a peace of mind.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this electric tea kettle because I have been using a glass kettle on the stove but my husband never hears it boiling and I’m afraid it might boil down to nothing and break when I’m not home to tell him “the waters boiling”. This kettle comes to a boil and then automatically shuts off in about 5 minutes👍 No bad taste or smell.

Its as easy as 1-2-3. Plug it in, fill it up and soon you have hot water.
I literally had 4 cups of boiling water in less than 2 minutes without the mess of splattering water all over the stove.
You can put it anywhere and it will be safe. Anywhere you have power you can now have hot water!

I liked the ease of mounting on the base for heating. The full swivel feature eliminates hunting for a starting position. I would have liked a 1 liter model since most of my use is for lesser volumes than 1.7 liters. The extra size and weight is a minus for me. It is an attractive addition to my everyday appliances.

I am so very satisfied with my new electric kettle. The aesthetics of this is great. I love the blue light when it is heating. I so appreciate that the water contacts only glass. It heats up quickly. This kettle is efficient, aesthetically pleasing and super clean.
Easy to clean, simple use, heated up quickly. All around great buy for this coffee lover.

This electric kettle is an ideal gift for every family. We love the LED indicator lights with the auto-stop function. Neat and quiet, no more whistle blowing noise in the house. The crystal clear glass container allows us to see the water from cold to boiling hot in a few minutes. The large lid allows us to clear the kettle easily. Highly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great Product. Reasonably priced and something that I use every day!
reviews.reviewText: I've been wanting a water boiler for some time now, so I was excited to see what this baby could do! I love that the pot is clear so that I can see exactly when the water begins to boil! It looks so sleek and clean, not to mention fast! Happy so far!

The kettle is very stylish and seems to be well made. The water heats quite fast and automatically turns off.
The kettle is BPA free since it is made of glass. The base does not take much space on a counter and the cord can be tuck away when not in use.
The blue LED is a very nice touch. Overall, an excellent kettle.

Easy to use and clean. Lid flips up with touch of a button. Minimal plastic pieces. Quick boiling time. Has blue light to indicate it is in use. Fits snuggly on the base and has appropriate length cord. Fits enough water to make glasses of tea or coffee for the entire family. Water with a little odd taste, but each electric kettle I've owned has been like this.

The look of the pot is picture perfect for my kitchen. However it’s usefulness is not. Every time I put water into my cup it leaks from somewhere unknown to me. Then if I leave water in it and come back there is water in my countertop . This product leaks from some unknown place and causes double work.

When I first took this electric kettle out of the box, I immediately loved the look of it! I didn’t know it would be just as easy to use. The blue LED light gives it a nice look as it’s working(quietly I might add.) The light shuts off when it’s done and you have tea-ready water! I have already recommended this product to friends of mine!

This electric kettle is perfect for quickly and efficiently boiling water. I used for a quick cup of tea and as a way to boil water faster for cooking. It handles both great. It's a bonus that the design is great and I can leave it out on my counter!
Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewTitle: Attractive, Easy to Use Electric Kettle
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this kettle to replace one my 96 year old mother used daily. She loves it! It’s easy for her to fill and operate. She especially loves the blue neon light ring. This is a very attractive, easy to use, and large capacity electric kettle that I would recommend if you are looking for an electric water kettle.

I love this electric kettle. It takes no time to heat up water and it's very easy to use. I cook in the kitchen a lot and it helps if you are cooking something that needs water. I also used it to make tea and it worked perfectly. It's a good product and I would recommend.

I found this electric water kettle to be pretty cool as it has LED lights. Also the clear glass allows you to see the water boil. One negative thing I found out is that you have to remove the limestone which can be an annoyance. Otherwise this product is pretty good.
OMG I am in love with my new kettle. Awesome for tea's and hot soups. Its light weight so easy to travel with. It's modern and elegant and makes a great addition to our kitchen counter.
Came in a nice package and is very well built! Boils water quickly!

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to use - eases the morning routine!
reviews.reviewText: This kettle is great -- it is very user-friendly, easy to use. Not only is it easy to clean, but it works wonderfully and has greatly cut down on the time it takes for me to get my morning tea ready. The design is modern and we are happy to leave on our counter for display. Would definitely recommend!

It works really well and fast. I've been able to prepare tea or coffee literally in 2 or 3 minutes and it's easy to use.
I've had it for 5 days and so far , so good.

This product is amazing. It looks so beautiful on my kitchen island and very useful. it boils the water in less then 5 min and turns off automatically when the water is boiled, unlike other kettles which beeps and you have to turn it off. i would recommend it to anyone who has busy mornings and want to make it quick. overall best one so far.
