reviews.reviewTitle: Boils water fast! Beautiful design. Very useful!
reviews.reviewText: This is a useful product. It boiled 16oz of water in less then 60 seconds. The design is beautiful. The quality is very high end. We used this for out hot chocolate bar over the weekend and what a difference it made over a stand carafe that could hold hot water.

I travel a lot for work, and the hotels I stay in will often have a kettle like this to heat water for coffee or tea. I use them a lot, so when I saw a chance to get this item I decided to give it a try for my home.
I am really impressed with the quality and stylishness of this kettle. Unlike the ones at the hotels, this one looks very "futuristic" and cool, especially when it is on and it lights up.
Most importantly, though, is the fact that it works very well. It will heat a full kettle of water (up to the "max" line) in just a few minutes, which is more than enough for several cups of coffee or soup or ramen or whatever. It will heat up just enough for one cup of coffee or tea in just a few seconds (almost instantly), which is what I use it for mostly. Compared to heating water on the stove it is soooo much faster.
One thing I especially like about this kettle is that it pours very smoothly, even if you try to pour it too fast. When pouring boiling hot water, you really don't want to spill it on yourself or anyone else. This kettle is designed so that even if you pour it too fast, it maintains a safe stream of water from the spout without running down the side or "sloshing" all over you.
The kettle itself is "wireless", meaning that when you pick it up to fill or pour it, there are no wires. When it is placed on the base, it will heat up, but when you pick it up from the base there are no cords or wires. It is just a kettle that can be carried around like any pitcher.
You will be surprised at how often you use this thing once you get it. It makes you wonder how you ever lived without one of these. For the price, it is a great deal and you will use it way more than you expected.

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to use and is quick to boil
reviews.reviewText:
In our apartment we get a electric stove and at times to heat water the electric stove takes quite a bit of time. I am not a big fan of using the microwave.
Got this 1.7L electric kettle and plugged it in. Filed it to the max allowed 1.7L and let it go. The water started heating up pretty quickly in a matter of minutes and I can say it took about 8 Minutes to boil the entire 1.7L which is probably less than half the time it takes on a traditional electric stove.
Now I use this to quickly boil the water and make tea in the morning. Now Tea preparation is saving me close to 10 minutes since the water is heated up pretty quickly. The LED at the bottom adds a nice little cosmetic touch.
Though being made of glass the kettle is not so heavy, Overall a deserving purchase for the kitchen.

This is a very nice electric tea kettle! It has blue LED lights that light up the bottom. It turns off when it’s done. It just boils water, so simple. That’s all I needed- I have a baby and we need hot water to warm his bottle. This is fast, so I can pour the hot water in a thermos to take with me when we leave the house. I never plan ahead of time so I need something quick for last minute trips. I just flip the switch and a minute or two later I have boiling hot water. Don’t worry I don’t put the water in his bottle! I just put his bottle in the water with milk already in it, to warm it. The tea kettle on the stove takes forever. This is quick and just what I needed! It’s glass so that’s nice and easy to clean. It’s a nice and simple electric tea kettle!

I needed a kettle that could boil a decent amount of water as well as easy to use without the traditional sounding kettles. So far it's been pretty easy to use. It boils up pretty quickly and the cleaning was easy. It's seems to be sturdy and good quality. It's not a small Kettle so just make sure you read the dimension. There is an auto off when the Kettle is done boiling so makes it easy. I did test out how hot it boils the water and the thermostat read 180 degrees. So it's pretty hot. It's a pretty straight forward Kettle. Just follow the instructions, don't over fill pass the Max and there's no concern about boiling out of the Kettle as it's not sealed. Also, you'll know it's in boiling process as the blue light will go on. Once it's done, the light will shut off. Can't get any user friendly or straight forward than this. If I had to say anything that could be improved , it's the length of the plug, it's not very long so do note that.

reviews.reviewTitle: This is the best electric kettle I've ever owned!
reviews.reviewText: I have 3 different electric kettles, one for my office, a vacation home and for our primary home. This kettle is by far my favorite of the 3. My primary concern was having a kettle that didn't have the hot water come in contact with any plastic. This company went out of their way to make a product with that in mind. One of my other kettles doesn't allow you to turn it off during the heating process, you have to physically take the pot off the heating element and if you put it back on, it will continue the boiling process which I don't like. HadinEEon Electric Kettle kettle allows you to turn it off at any point, say if you only want warm to hot water and not boiled water. And it won't continue trying to boil if you put it back on the heating element. The glass is high quality, it heats water quickly, the blue LED light is a nice touch and overall, both my husband and I are thrilled with this kettle!

reviews.reviewTitle: This thing is a LIFESAVER for a bed-bound patient and would look GREAT in any kitchen as well.
reviews.reviewText: I was in a major car accident and expect to be bed-bound for 6-10 weeks. I needed a source of hot water for a couple of different things; to wet wash cloths so I could give myself a bed/bath, making herbal tea and most importantly to fill my heavy glass bong with nearly boiling water. I could have bought a cheaper model for $10 less but I like the design of this one and it seems to be worth the difference in performance. First boil it only took 3 minutes to bring 1.5 liters to a boil. The thermo turned it off after it came to a rolling boil, as advertised. I may just have to go back to my French Press coffee maker for a while though I do love my espresso machine it’s operation is beyond my ability for now. Bottom line: It seems to be worth every penny and close inspection convinces me the warranty, as fantastic as it is, will likely never be needed!

reviews.reviewTitle: Super quiet, easy and safer than traditional tea kettle, love the automatic shut-off!
reviews.reviewText: I just purchased the HadinEEon Electric Kettle 1.7L Glass Electric Tea Kettle (BPA Free) Cordless with LED Indicator Lights and am very pleased with it. It is super quiet as compared to our "screaming" traditional tea kettle. I didn't need to use a hot pad to hold it, and the water flowed out very nicely while pouring, vs. our old tea kettle, which would burn my hand if not using a hot pad, and the water would spurt out when full, making a mess; so it is definitely safer to use. When using the electric kettle, the blue LED lights give an up-to-date look to our kitchen. The automatic shut-off is a definite plus! Many times I would start our stove with the old tea kettle on it, and would be working somewhere else in the house, where it would be a few minutes before I could get back to it, meanwhile it was whistling non-stop and water was boiling away. The clear glass kettle is helpful as I can see at a glance whether I need to refill it, or just start it. I really can't rave enough about this purchase!

I really enjoy this HadinEEon electric kettle because it makes it very practical to warm up water for my tea. All I have to do is fill the kettle with water and turn it on. After the water boils the kettle automatically shuts off, so I don't have to keep baby sitting it. You can hear it switching off, and the blue light goes off at the same time. If you want to see/hear what I mean, take a look at the short video I attached to this review. It captured the exact moment the kettle went off after boiling some water.
The water reaches the boiling point rather quickly. Boiling two cups of water takes me about 90 seconds.
The glass makes it easy to keep clean, and the 3 year warranty provided by the manufacturer confirms this is a good quality kettle.

reviews.reviewTitle: Fast Heating, could use a couple other features
reviews.reviewText:
After I purchased this item I found out my wife bought one from a big warehouse retailer.
The picture shows this product on the left.
Both are very similar in function.
Pros:
- Easy unpacking
- Very fast boiling: 1200W vs the other one being 1100W
- Comes with 3 yr warranty
- Easy to clean

Cons:
- Tab to open the top vs a button on the handle
- Other product had a tea filter option with a filter built in the spout

Bottom Line: Great product. Again a couple other feature would be helpful but if you want to simply boil water this is the product. Customer service is A+, very prompt responses for my questions.

It is a really attractive kettle, which wasn't even one of my criteria! But, it's nice to have it look attractive on the counter. One of the first things I did when I moved into my new home is set up a tea/coffee corner, and this makes it look so nice (sleek). I also really like that the lid opens up wide enough to clean it well. My other electric kettle only opened to about 45 degrees, so could not clean it well, and it was not clear so I could never tell what was "lurking beneath the surface" and be confident it was really clean. Love this!

The design is very sleek and modern, matching my kitchen appliances. When it’s turned on, there is a nice soft blue glow to indicate the kettle is in use. I appreciate the thicker, insulated handle to help prevent any burns while pouring. The lid opens slowly so steam doesn’t pour out and cause burns as I’m pouring the hot water. It took about 6 mins to boil a full 7 cups and only 4 mins for 4 cups. I see myself using this to make oatmeal for the whole family on mornings we are running behind and to make my daily cup of hot tea.

reviews.reviewTitle: love the clear and clean looking
reviews.reviewText:
Our old kettle is fully metal (aluminum? ) and it gets a white deposit from the water. We often have to wash or soak with vinegar. However, the feeling of worrying about if any metal toxicity will leak into the water never goes away.

This kettle is mostly constructed with glass, its easy to clean and easy cleanout white water spots. The heating element works well, the whole pot of water can be heat up in just a couple of minutes. So far the kettle seems very solid and the LED indicator works well and very stylish.

I have used this kettle for several times and it is working great so far! I use it kettle for making my tea, morning coffee & instant soups. It is very easy to use, to clean and maintain. It also heats water so quickly in just a few minutes and the blue light displayed while heating the water is a nice touch. The auto shut-off feature works reliably at all water levels, it shutting off a couple seconds after the water comes to a full boil. I like being able to see inside the kettle so I can see everything inside and know when clean it when needed. At this time, I really enjoy this kettle and if something happens in the next few weeks, I'll update my review accordingly.

I ordered the clear Kettle to easily see the amount of water and to be able to see the boiling status. That is easily accommodated and the blue light makes it possible to do without turning lights on in the middle of the night! The metric and US measurements are clear and easy to read which is a big help. The only issue I had was that the cord is very large and very stiff making placement on the counter and in the cord receptacle a small challenge but nothing that cannot be overcome.

I really like the ease of using this kettle. You literally fill it with anywhere from 2-7 cups of cold water, close the cover, set it on its stand and press the power button. Only the heat resistant Borosilicate glass body gets hot, everything else stays cool to the touch. I think if you use distilled or spring water, as opposed to tap water, the limescale might not be terrible. However, getting rid of the limescale is as easy as letting white vinegar sit in the kettle for a while, then run water through a couple of boiling cycles.

Love this kettle. It works very well. It takes 7 minutes to boil 7 cups which is its full capacity. 4 minutes for 4 cups so you could say a minute per cup. The automatic shutoff is a great safety feature so if you leave the kitchen and forget it is ok. The lid on top is wide enough so you can get into it to clean. Recommended cleaning is with vinegar. The kettle rests securely on its base. Aesthetically it is very pleasing to the eye. The glass looks beautiful not to mention the blue led light when it is switched on. Overall very functional and a great addition to my kitchen.

This kettle is a replacement for one that died way too early.

The speed at which it heats water is impressive! The blue light is cool too.

Can't comment on cleaning just yet, but so far it seems it would be fairly easy. The only thing I need to get used to is the lid flip design. It's a little different than other kettles and easier for hot water to bounce back on the hands. Other than that so far so good!

reviews.reviewTitle: Safe, easy, great technology, and it's pretty!
reviews.reviewText: I searched high and low for a new electric kettle and, after reading the positive reviews as well as the specs, I decided on this one. I made the right decision! I liked that this one has a British Strix thermostat (you can read about that in the specs), but most of all, I love that it is safe (auto-shutoff) as we have a young one. When the water is heating a blue LED light around the base of the pot lights up so you know it's on. This is a great kettle for such a low price! Two thumbs up.

I love the look of this kettle, the ease of it being electric, and the lights! It’s extremely easy to operate and keep clean. I have used it for tea as well as to more quickly and easily boil water for sterilizing my babies bottles/pacis/teethers/etc. I’m also planning to use this to heat water for oatmeal, as it’s so much quicker and easier than having to stand by the stove with a pot of water. Loving this product so far.

Great product overall. Love the design, the blue light is pretty. Seems like a quality item that will last. See the video for unboxing and boiling. Boils Max fill in about 5 minutes. I love that the heater pad is separate from the kettle, the only other settles I've used had a coil inside and ended up becoming disgusting after multiple uses. This seems like it will be easy to clean and maintain.

From reading the description I got the impression that nothing but glass and stainless steel touch the water. However, there's a silicone-like substance at the bottom of the kettle which stays in constant contact with any water you leave in the kettle between boils. I returned the kettle because of this. I'd rather boil water with a simple stainless steel pot.

This is a very nice kettle. Purchased to replace another from a different company that died after one year. Was pleased with the ease of use and happy to see a three year warranty policy along with a e-mail support system. I am a decaf coffee and tea drinker so it is perfect for me. Heats quickly and better than the microwave. Packaged nicely and speedy delivery.

reviews.reviewTitle: This electric kettle is perfect, you will love it!
reviews.reviewText: I’m so glad I purchased this kettle! It’s so easy to use and water boils very quickly. You don’t have to wait like you do when putting water on the stove to boil. I love the style and the led lights. It looks very nice on my counter top. If you are looking to purchase an electric kettle , I would highly recommend this one! It’s perfect, you will love it!

Our previous kettle was metal with a small lid. This kettle is glass, so it's easy to see how much water there is, the blue glow shows that it's on, and the large lid allows me to get my hand into the kettle to clean it if necessary. I looked at a lot of options, and this one had everything I wanted for a very reasonable price.

Very nice stylish electric kettle! Could not believe how fast it boiled water. Nice added feature with the removable kettle, no worries about the cord. Lift off plate and pour the boiling hot water where you need it. LED light let's you know the kettle is on. No whistle like the old school stove top kettles, but not a big deal because it boils water very fast.

Super excited on the arrival of this electric kettle. I am a lover of hot tea especially in fall and winter. This kettle is clean and sleek looking love the bkue light and is very quick in getting just the right amount of water boiling quickly!highly recommend.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good Upgrade from a Traditional Kettle
reviews.reviewText:
What a great value.
This elegant, electric kettle is a much appreciated upgrade to our old style kettle.
It boils more quickly and frees up a burner on our stove in the morning.
It regulates itself; will not boil over, and it is very easy to clean. When we travel, we take this kettle with us, so we can have tea whenever, and wherever we find ourselves.
I am certain that we will be purchasing more of these, as it makes a great gift as well.

reviews.reviewTitle: quick easy excited for cold weather drinks
reviews.reviewText: Did the test pot (first pot you heat and dump). I can't believe how quickly it gets going. So excited that it auto shuts off when it gets to the boiling temp so I don't need to make a dash for the whistling kettle on the stove (will sort of miss the sound, but not the dash).

reviews.reviewTitle: Great Price and an AWESOME PRODUCT!!!
reviews.reviewText:
I just remodeled my house and the look of this Electric Kettle matches perfectly with the modern theme I went with on the interior of my house! Black, Chrome, Glass, AND BLUE LIGHTS!
It looks amazing in the evening while I am heating up water for my tea!
And it boils the water fast. 2+ cups of water in less than a minute!
I will be buying one for my office at work also. THANK YOU!!!

Best kettle ever! I was in shock when I filled this kettle to the max line and the water boiled in 2 mins. I love that the kettle itself is cordless and is light even with water in it. Surprisingly when boiling if you accidentally touch the glass it will not burn. It’s not cold but not 3rd degree burn worthy like my stove kettle. This kettle rocks.

First time I used this kettle and I was in awe by the LED blue light when the kettle heats up. The kettle heats up pretty fast. Since the kettle is clear, it is easy to clean. Im using this kettle to drink tea at my office and Im loving it.

Great kettle. Boils water quickly and effectively.
Love the design for opening the lid. Very helpful, since a simple push-button can stop working (push-button lids are the bane of my existence), and the lid on this is not a push-button lid, so I have confidence this lid will hold up.

love the blue light/halo, turns a boring looking kettle into a futuristic appliance. I also love the glass housing, as I have a stainless steel one before, makes it easier to spot the internal to when cleaning.

good buy.

I really like this a lot! I had my other stainless steel one for way too long! Glass is the way to go. It boils quickly and my 5 year old loves watching it. It is so much easier to keep clean than my old one as well.

I don’t know much about electric kettles but I picked this one up on a recommendation and haven’t been disappointed. Honestly quite impressed at how fast it boils water and the overall quality. Thank agin

I love this product. It arrived on time and I washed it out first, filled it up and plugged it in. I am really happy with this. It’s easy, clean, and it works really well. It’s perfect for hot tea. Much better than microwaving water for tea. Awesome electric kettle.
Aesthetically it's really a beautiful kettle and I liked the blue led while it's on. It didn't take long to boil the water. It has also an auto-off feature for safety.

The tea kettle was so easy to use! I mean super easy. All you have to do is fill with water, plug it in and hit the switch and in a matter of seconds it starts to boil the water. This sure does beat boiling water on the stove.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great replacement for the old looking stainless steel kettle
reviews.reviewText: Great water capacity and heating power, but the feature I like most is how it looks. The glass and blue light allows to see inside the kettle and adds a modern look to the kitchen.

reviews.reviewTitle: Love the fact that you can take it off the base in it has a shut off timer
reviews.reviewText: Receive the item on time tried it out immediately looks very nice heated up very quickly it did do the shut off automatically which was nice and of course the glass was hot so you have to be careful easy to clean get your hand down in there and dry it all in all really like the item
This kettle is excellent. The fact that it's glass ensures no rust (my stainless steel one had rust on the bottom after a while) and it has a large capacity yet is lightweight. Highly recommend! :)

This product is very convenient to have instead of using a microwave, which is what I’ve been doing for years. You can reheat the water multiple times and it only takes a few minutes. Easy to use at work as well. This is a must have product.

This is the first time I am using a fancy kettle which glows beautifully to indicate the kettle is in progress of heating the water. Water gets heated up quickly like within a minute for 4-5 cups of water. Lid latches up very nicely and the kettle doesn't require to open the lid to pour the water. Overall fancy and durable kettle.
This is a great asset to my kitchen. I was able to keep it plugged as the on switch is located on the handle. So easy to use and heats up fast.

Great design and attractive product. Works great, easy to clean and love the stainless on the top and bottom of the carafe. Did initial boil per the instructions. No aftertaste, quick heating and the unit looks great.
Easy to use, brings water boiling within a few minutes. Seems to be made of real borosilicate glass (same stuff as in pyrex) so it won't chip/crack easily.
Very nice, stylish tea kettle, the lid opens wide which makes it accessible to put water easily! Looks good in the interior, super simple to use! I times the boiling time, it was 8 min

reviews.reviewTitle: It's a light show with this kettle!
reviews.reviewText: This kettle is an easy set up. I like the look and the feel of it. It's well made... comfortable for in my hand and the light show when it's on is really pretty. It adds a little bit of pizazz to my kitchen and I love it!
IT IS GLASS AND METAL ONLY. That all I wanted. No PLASTIC in boiling water.
I am glad I bought this. It's easy to use, easy to clean, and quick to heat water. I am satisfied with this purchase.
This is a nice stainless looking kettle. Does the job fairly quickly.

I love that the kettle itself is glass. All metal stays cool to the touch and the LEDs warn from touching. It has auto shut off. It looks beautiful and I made my tea right in it after the water boiled. I really like it.
Didn't have it long and it just stopped working....

reviews.reviewTitle: Fast and healthy cup of tea!
reviews.reviewText: I love this tea kettle! It heats the water very fast. I love that there is no plastic to worry about.
Great upgrade from our last pot, nice + big too. Fast shipping!
This is a beautiful kettle. The water boils fast. I am happy with this product. I recommend it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Instant Boil in less than 3 minutes
reviews.reviewText: Instant boil in less than 3 minutes! And auto turn off and super easy to use. Love the look, the led light and is light weight and BPA free. Auto off is also amazing
Easy, simple operation. Build quality seems to be good no complaints so far.

reviews.reviewTitle: It holds more water than my old pot!
reviews.reviewText: It is what the reviews showed the pot to be!
I like it. Only have had it for a month. But is good if It lasts.
The large capacity is exactly what I needed. Easy to operate. There is NOT a funny taste to the water. This kettle exceeds expectations.
This kettle is very convenient and quick. I was surprised how quick the water got warm, and use it every morning for my coffee. Doesn’t feel cheap either.

I LOVE LOVE LOVE this product!!! perfect for making tea and doesn’t take up much counter space at all. It also comes with a three year warranty Which is a mega bonus! Such great quality at an affordable price.
Love this product for anything that requires hot water. Functionally awesome and aesthetically pleasing.

reviews.reviewTitle: I like my Glass Electric Tea Kettle.
reviews.reviewText: I like my Glass Electric Tea Kettle.
So excited for this product!! I like that the whole carafe is glass. Perfect size for easy counter access!
I purchased it for my mom. She adores by this Kettle. I would recommend this item!
I haven't cleaned it yet but it work good and I like the blue light

reviews.reviewTitle: Looks great and works very well!
reviews.reviewText: This is a great tea kettle. It looks really great and does the job well - boils water really quickly.
This is perfect for the office or home...anytime of the year!! Heated in minutes.
Great product. Hold a lot of water. Attractive look with transparent glass. Love it.
Very nice design, was surprised how silent it is, quick, durable, no any dislikes so far

reviews.reviewTitle: Very nice Kettle for your kitchen or office!
reviews.reviewText:
This looks very fancy with the food grade stainless steel and glass materials. It quickly can boil up to 7 cups of water for your tea, coffee, etc.

Top features:
1. Water touches glass and food grade stainless steel.
2. Easy pour spout to guide water into cups
3. LED blue lights come on to warn folks that water is boiling and not to touch!
4. large 7 cup capacity
5. Easy to use, with just a single button to control on/off
6. Thick gauge wire from outlet to the Kettle's base

As far as I can tell, after a few uses all the details listed for this item are accurate and I have rated it overall 4 stars. Some improvements can be made by the next model but I am not an engineer so I can't quite pinpoint what they should be. But I am happy with it so far!
I love it.It is perfect and also is really cool.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great look for a good price
reviews.reviewText: We have a modern kitchen and this kettle looks great on the counter. It works well. The top you just have to remember to push down to close but zero issues so far. Very happy.
The unit was fine but I tried to get on there site to get the free coffee mugs and it wouldn't let me in
Great quality and easy to clean !!
Good quality product. Works fast and looks good. It is blue light when you turn it on. I like it!

qAndA.question: Are there any plastic parts which come into contact with the boiling water?
qAndA.answer: No there are no plastic parts that touch the boiling water. the lid and handle have some plastic, but does not touch the boiling water at all. We really enjoy the efficiency of this pot and the fact that is has an added filtration system to it. I hope that helps :-)

qAndA.question: How long does the guarantee last
qAndA.answer: It has a 3 year gurantee

qAndA.question: Can anyone tell me if the electric kettle is bpa free?
qAndA.answer: It is BPA Free. All of the plastic is outside the glass kettle, which will not directly contact with water.

qAndA.question: Where is it made?
qAndA.answer: Made in China

qAndA.question: Can you get your hand inside to clean the electric kettle?
qAndA.answer: Yes, it's a wide opening. I can fit my hand inside, cleans well with the descaler.

qAndA.question: How tall is this teapot from the base to the top?
qAndA.answer: 9 inches

qAndA.question: How long is the cord?
qAndA.answer: The cord is 28 inches including the plug.

qAndA.question: Does this kettle have a glass base over the heating element or does it a metal base with glass sides?
qAndA.answer: It’s a metal base with glass sides.

qAndA.question: Does this kettle have any plastic or silicone parts that touch water during boiling, or when water's poured from the spout, or through condensation?
qAndA.answer: No, bottom the of the lid is stainless steel

qAndA.question: Does the water touch any silicone? Is there a silicone layer where the glass connects with the metal?
qAndA.answer: No, Glass sides with a Metal Bottom.

qAndA.question: What is the guarantee on this electric kettle?
qAndA.answer: Instruction explains that it comes with 3 year warranty.

qAndA.question: Does this version have a EU wall plug?
qAndA.answer: No it does not have an EU plug. Good

qAndA.question: How many watts is it?
qAndA.answer: According to the bottom power unit, it is 1000 - 1200 W

qAndA.question: How long is the lead of this electric kettle? please
qAndA.answer: 2.46ft from base to plug!

qAndA.question: Where is the product made?
qAndA.answer: It says Made in China. But the product ships pretty quickly!

qAndA.question: input 110v? 220v? I need 220v??? thank you
qAndA.answer: I am pretty sure it is 120v

qAndA.question: Is this kettle made in China?
qAndA.answer: Yes

qAndA.question: Does anyone had problems with the cord? How can I contact the seller?
qAndA.answer: No problem with the cord after several months of regular use. If you meet some problems, I would suggest contacting Seller and they will suggest how to proceed.

qAndA.question: Hello, looks really smart I just purchased one. But can you tell me how long its guaranteed for. Thank you
qAndA.answer: 3 year warranty. You should have a brochure with it that shows the contact information. You can reach out to them for assistance.

qAndA.question: Is this electric kettle cordless?
qAndA.answer: The base has a cord but the kettle is cordless

qAndA.question: Will there be scale in this kettle?
qAndA.answer: There was scale yes, but I live in a very hard water area, and it could still be cleaned off with white vinegar

qAndA.question: Any problem using this electric kettle for boiling medicinal leaves inside?
qAndA.answer: No

qAndA.question: How is this a cordless unit?? i very much love the tea pot, but i was under the impression that it was cord less. please help!!
qAndA.answer: The base is plugged in with a cord but the teakettle is removed from the base to pour and has no cord attached.

qAndA.question: After it's boiled does the LED illuminaton switch off, or does it still have some colour on?
qAndA.answer: When the electric kettle has finished boiling the water it switches off and light goes out at same time

qAndA.question: Is this electric kettle made completely of stainless steel on both the base and the lid?
qAndA.answer: The inside top and bottom are stainless steel and decanter is glass. The water does not come in contact with the plastic.

qAndA.question: does it have keep warm feature?
qAndA.answer: It does not.

qAndA.question: What is the least smallest minimum tiniest amount of water you can safely boil in this kettle? Can it boil only 8 oz?
What is the minimum volume of water that can be boiled?
qAndA.answer: The capacity of it is 7 cups of water or 1.7 Liters.
